All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    CSVReader
    This class contains a static method that links the app to CSV files within the user's computer.
    CSVWriter
    This class contains a static method that links the app to CSV files within the user's computer.
    Dessert
    An entity class that stores information of a dessert.
    Drink
    An entity class that stores information of a drink.
    ExceptionHandler
    This class contains methods which ensures that only valid values are passed to the functions calling them.
    Exportable
    This class defines an interface for wrappers to export object data via the CSVWriter class.
    Importable
    This class defines an interface for wrappers to import object data via the CSVReader class.
    Invoice
    Stores the information when a customer pays a bill
    InvoiceBoundary
    Sets as a boundary between the control classes and user Prints the invoice and sales report in the console Asks the date
    InvoiceIO
    This class serves as a wrapper and translator for an ArrayList of Invoice objects for import and export from and to a CSV file.
    InvoiceManager
    Stores all the invoice Connects invoice boundary to print invoice Initialise an invoice manager in the main app
    MainCourse
    An entity class that stores information of a main course A subclass of MenuItem
    Menu
    Manages the actions that can be done on a menu A menu consists of a list of menu items
    MenuBoundary
    Prints commands to show the user and take inputs from the user
    MenuIO
    This class serves as a wrapper and translator for an ArrayList of MenuItem objects for import and export from and to a CSV file.
    MenuItem
    An entity class that stores information of a menu item
    Order
    This class contains data representing an order.
    OrderBoundary
    This class acts as a boundary between the user and the OrderManager class.
    OrderManager
    This class performs logical operations on the collection of orders.
    PathHelper
    This class exists to aid in pointing the java environment to the correct folder which stores the saved/exported data.
    PromotionalItem
    An entity class that stores information of a promotional item A subclass of MenuItem
    Reservation
    An entity that stores the reservation details from customers.
    ReservationBoundary
    Acts as a class to take reservation-related inputs from users and print the outputs to show the users
    ReservationIO
    This class serves as a wrapper and translator for an ArrayList of Invoice objects for import and export from and to a CSV file.
    ReservationManager
    A control stereotype Represents a reservation manager in the system.
    RestaurantApp
    This is the class containing the main method.
    RestaurantBoundary
    This class acts as the boundary between the main function in RestaurantApp and the user.
    Staff
    A class to represent a staff member entity.
    Staff.Gender
    Available genders.
    StaffManager
    A control stereotype Represents a staff manager in the system.
    Table
    An entity class that denotes an instance of a table.
    TableBoundary
    Acts as a class to take table-related inputs from users and print the outputs to show the users
    TableManager
    Represents a table manager in the system.
